name: Joust (itch)
description:
Described by many as The Jesus of Games, this horrific mockery of 1982's arcade classic Joust will leave you screaming for more, and screaming in pleasure. Shit has never looked so good.

Co-Created by Ben Chill

Play now on Scirra.com: https://www.scirra.com/arcade/multiplayer-games/jo...
